channel.title: Posts on Four Sore Eyes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Four Sore Eyes

item.title: On consciousness part 1 of ...
item.description: Self Awareness The nature of consciousness, how it’s defined, what forces and machinery is is built on, and where do those systems reside and what are their the boundaries is What will follow is more a stream of, potentially illformed, ill-informed and self conflicting hypotheses. Truth is, I think quite a lot about this subject and consume the content of several notable thinkers on this topic, but I don’t understand much of the detail that these thinkers assert with a certitude that unsettles me.

item.title: Write out in the open
item.description: Reasoning ‘A Site Four Sore Eyes’ This is place where I can publish my ideas for the audience of me. I have an ever growing number of thixotropic reasons for setting up this platform. Probably the greatest overarching argument is to give me a place where I can air out my most persistent ruminations. This, in my fuzzy uncheckable logic, might - just might - provide some time and virtual space between my, in-this-moment thoughts, and my many-later-moments reconsiderations, allowing me to take them in with fresher, or simply differently focused eyes.
